text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer explicitly mentions Tag-Along Rights and defines them as ensuring that if the founders sell their shares, the investor can sell their shares on the same terms, which aligns with the criterion's requirement to define the right as ensuring the investor can sell a pro rata portion of shares alongside the founders on the same terms.", "criterion_id": "32a99ce4-2e4a-42d1-bf72-6db07c939b16"}
